name: Quickshot Yellow: The Quest for Green Flags
name_original: Quickshot Yellow: The Quest for Green Flags
description:
Instructions: WASD or ↑←↓→ to move, 1 2 3 switch abilities. R resets current level.

I wanted to make a puzzle game. Mission Successful?

I think I did… okay. My biggest mistake I think is giving the player three abilities instead of two, but I only realized that about an hour before submission and I didn’t think I had enough time to redo the puzzles. The theme only comes out really in the last two puzzles because of this.
